data.title: Cast
data.meta_description:
WATCH ALL NEW EPISODES
WEEKDAYS AT 4PM ET/1PM PT
with encores at 9PM ET/6PM PT
and MIDNIGHT ET/9PM PT
ONLY on Popstar!TV
data.text:
Pete Garrett is the heartthrob of Bay City and the youngest of matriarch Sara Garrett's three children. A charming romantic, Pete often wins the heart of many women, but his heart once captured by his mother's arch rival Janice Ramos, now belongs to Bay City's beauty, Vivian.

-Multiple Emmy® award-winning Actor Kristos Andrews won the prestigious award several times for his duo roles as Bay City hero Pete Garrett and British bad boy antagonist Adam Kenway. Andrews was also Emmy® nominated for his role as teen heartthrob Tyler on the POP TV series THIS JUST IN. He is recognized for his work in many feature motion pictures including the Lionsgate action film SURVIVE THE GAME, opposite Bruce Willis and DARKNESS OF MAN from the same director, James Cullen Bressack, starring Jean Claude Van Damme. He starred as the lead character in one of Tubi’s number one action films BREAKOUT, with an all-star cast and has also played leads in a slew of others feature motion pictures available on Netflix, Showtime, Lifetime and more. He portrays the lead role in the upcoming film noir adaptation of Edgar Allan Poe’s THE RAVEN, written and directed by Gregori J. Martin. In addition to acting and no stranger to receiving award recognition, Andrews is an X Games Gold Medalist in extreme sports and two-time Guinness World Record holder.

IMDb

Nefarious and conniving, Steve Jensen is obsessed with Sara Garrett. the woman he raped twenty years prior. Now married to Sara, Steve continually plots to control his wife and her fortune. With devastating changes on the horizon and the help of an unexpected ally, his desperate tactics threaten to cause chaos.

-Matthew Ashford is an Emmy® Award-winning producer and multiple Emmy® Award-nominated actor. Ashford is best known for his role as Jack Deveraux on NBC's Days of our Lives. Prime-time credits include Dharma & Greg, Providence, and Charmed. In addition to several feature films, Ashford also played a lead character in the national tour of Mamma Mia and has appeared on POP TV's Emmy® nominated teen sitcom This Just In.

IMDb

Arrogant and intelligent, Bay City's newest District Attorney Evan Blackwell is determined not only to follow in his father's footsteps but to surpass them. Undaunted by the danger that surrounds him, Evan finds himself falling for a woman in peril.

-Brandon Beemer is a two time Emmy® Award-nominated actor and is widely recognized for his

Arrogant and intelligent, Bay City's newest District Attorney Evan Blackwell is determined not only to follow in his father's footsteps but to surpass them. Undaunted by the danger that surrounds him, Evan finds himself falling for a woman in peril.

-Brandon Beemer is a two time Emmy® Award-nominated actor and is widely recognized for his roles as Shawn Brady on NBC's Days of our Lives and as Owen Knight on CBS's The Bold and the Beautiful. Beemer's additional feature film and television credits include Material Girls, CSI: Miami, Blood Moon, Fear Clinic, Hallmark's Wedding Planner Mystery, and more. He also modeled for international brands Boss and Perry Ellis.

IMDb

Young and focused, the son of the late Marly Garrett-Foster and grandson of matriarch Sara Garrett is determined to make his mark in Bay City. Juggling high school and an internship at Bay University Hospital, RJ is often faced with tough decisions, chilling disasters, and temptations that could derail his promising future.

-Najee De-Tiege is an award-winning actor best known for his role as “Kevin,” the Blue Samurai Ranger, in the Power Rangers Samurai TV franchise. De-Tiege's additional television and film appearances include Actor for Hire, The Gallery, Class Act, Vamp, A Man for Every Month, Minay TV, and more.

IMDb

Bay City's matriarch Sara Garrett is a young-at-heart socialite who's the object of many a man's desire. She's inherited the Garrett empire from her late grandfather, the evil Senator Red Garrett. Now married to her rapist, Steve Jensen, Sara struggles to come to terms with her past and take charge of the present.

-A multiple Emmy® Award winner in the category “Outstanding Actress in a Digital Drama Series” for THE BAY, Mary Beth Evans is also known for her iconic Emmy® Award-winning role as Kayla Brady on NBC's Days of our Lives. Episodic appearances include Chasing Life, Body of Proof, Criminal Minds, Monk, Nip/Tuck, and more.

IMDb

Insecure yet feisty and with a mind of her own, Tamara Garrett doesn't shy away from trouble, even when led by her often misguided heart. In her unrelenting search for love, the cousin of Bay City's rich and powerful often finds herself in dangerous situations... especially now that ghosts from her past have come back to haunt her.

-Celeste Fianna has starred in multiple indie feature films including A Place Called Hollywood and The Southside, as well as the television series Destination X: California. Fianna is also a multiple Emmy® Award-winning producer, recognized for her work on THE BAY. Additional appearances include The Dream of Alvareen, Getting That Girl, and more.

IMDb

-Mike Manning won an Emmy® for his role as Caleb McKinnon on THE BAY and was nominated again at this year for Best Supporting Actor. He is best known for his role in the popular Disney movie CLOUD 9, and has appeared in a slew of feature motion pictures, including the civil rights drama SON OF THE SOUTH, executive produced by Oscar-winner Spike Lee and the upcoming film noir adaptation of Edgar Allan Poe’s THE RAVEN by Gregori J. Martin, among other features. In television, Manning is also known for his guest star roles in NBC’s THIS IS US and MTV’s TEEN WOLF and recently played the popular recurring character of town villain Charlie Dale on NBC’s DAYS OF OUR LIVES. Other TV credits include Tyler Perry’s THE HAVES AND HAVE NOTS, MAJOR CRIMES on TNT and more. In addition to performing in front of the camera, Manning is a screenwriter with several projects in development, including the upcoming Anthony Hopkins film EYES IN THE TREES. He is a proud advocate and supporter for many important causes such as The Thirst Project and Boo to Bullying.

IMDb

Bay City's former D.A., John Blackwell, known as “Blackwell,” is a man on a mission. No longer seeking revenge, instead, he finds himself on the other side of the world seeking justice. Son of Jack Madison and half-brother to Sara Garrett, Blackwell is determined to make right what has gone so terribly wrong.

-Ronn Moss is an Emmy® Award-nominated actor and multiple Emmy® Award-winning producer. An international star known for his role as Ridge Forrester on CBS's The Bold and the Beautiful, Moss's acting credits also include the TV series comedy Bruna in Beverly Hills, Bolt, Christmas in Love, Six Feet Under, The Next Mrs. Jacob Anderson, and more. Moss is also known as a musician singer/songwriter and as a member of the band 'Player.'

IMDb

A member of the Garrett family, Daniel is brother to Avery, nephew to Sara, and a best-friend-cousin to Pete. Daniel often finds himself at the wrong place at the wrong time for all the wrong reasons. Realizing he must be true to himself, Daniel continues to struggle with the consequences of his sexuality.

-Eric Nelsen is an Emmy® Award-winning actor and a multiple Emmy® Award-winning producer known for his role as Ennis in Paramount+’s 1883 and Howie in the feature film A Walk Among the Tombstones. Nelsen has recently completed filming the TV pilot Erase for the USA Network in addition to the feature film The Last Whistle. He also recently booked the recurring role of Bram on Showtime's The Affair for season 4. Nelsen has starred in multiple television and feature films including The Blacklist, The Following, Chasing Yesterday, Blue Bloods, The Good Wife, Night Has Settled, and more.

IMDb

-Recently joining the cast as series regular Nick Myers on the Emmy Award winning series THE BAY, James Preston is no stranger to television, having appeared as a guest star on several popular episodics, including CBS’s BLUE BLOODS and CSI: NY. He starred in the recurring role of Lukas Ford on ABC’s primetime drama THE GATES, opposite Frank Grillo and more recently as the antagonist in the Hallmark feature film ALOHA WITH LOVE. Preston is known for his portrayal of James Dean in the controversial cult critically acclaimed and award winning indie feature motion picture JOSHUA TREE, 1951: A PORTRAIT OF JAMES DEAN, currently available on streaming. He often collaborates with indie horror film director Samuel Gonzalez, Jr. starring in several of his films including THE PASSAGE, THE SPRINGFIELD THREE, and most recently THE PLASTIC MEN. Preston is set to appear in the upcoming 80’s themed feature horror BRUTE 1986 from director Marcel Walz. Prior to his acting career, Preston was an established model for high fashion brands such as Abercrombie & Fitch and many more.

IMDb

Bay City's police commissioner Lex Martin struggles with more than those who break the law. Once married to Sara's aunt, his feelings for Sara can no longer be denied. As Sara deals with her forced marriage to the nefarious Steve Jensen, Lex vows to help the woman he loves no matter the consequences.

-Tristan Rogers is known for his portrayal of the popular characters 'Scorpio' on ABC's General Hospital and 'Colin Atkinson' on CBS's The Young and The Restless. Rogers has been nominated for several awards including a Soap Digest Award for “Outstanding Actor in a Leading Role.” Rogers’ character was re-introduced on Night Shift, a prime-time spin-off of General Hospital and has starred on The Bold and the Beautiful, Family Law, Walker, Texas Ranger, The Love Boat, and more.

IMDb

Bay City Herald's ace reporter, Zoey Johnson is as stubborn and determined as they come. Sister to Mack Johnson and Vivian Johnson's much-adored aunt, Zoey is a sweetheart who suddenly discovers not everyone appreciates her high standards and inquisitive nature. Zoey struggles to let go of the past even though her future remains uncertain.

-Taylor Stanley is known for her role of Karen on ABC's popular sitcom Spin City and for her portrayal of Remy Woods on NBC's Another World. Stanley has also appeared in multiple television series and feature films including Numb3ers, The Crucible, Cloudstreet, Secret Cutting, Touched by an Angel, Broken Boy Soldier, Black Cadillac, and more.

IMDb

A southern belle and eccentric event planner who charmed her way into Jack Madison's heart, Sofia is known for being a doting wife, loving mother, and Bay City's first lady. With Jack's best interest at heart, Sofia learns the hard way that it's those you love who can hurt you the most. Her psychic-like abilities tend to keep the ones she

A southern belle and eccentric event planner who charmed her way into Jack Madison's heart, Sofia is known for being a doting wife, loving mother, and Bay City's first lady. With Jack's best interest at heart, Sofia learns the hard way that it's those you love who can hurt you the most. Her psychic-like abilities tend to keep the ones she loves on edge.

-Jacklyn Zeman is a four-time Daytime Emmy® Award-nominated actress best known for her role as Bobbie Spencer on the ABC daytime drama, General Hospital, and as Lana McClain on ABC's One Life to Live. Winner of Hollywood International Favorite Actress Award and Soap Opera Digest Award Winner, Zeman's additional Television and film appearances include National Lampoon's Class Reunion, Young Doctors in Love, Jury Duty, Montana Crossroads, Mad TV, Chicago Hope, Love American Style, Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous, Make This Place Your Home and more.

IMDb
